text: ATOMIC COMMIT PROTOCOL When a multi-node txn finishes, the DBMS needs to ask all the nodes involved whether it is safe to commit. Examples: — Two-Phase Commit — Three-Phase Commit (not used) — Paxos — Raft | — ZAB (Apache Zookeeper) = — Viewstamped Replication £2CMUDB q ; o M > PI M 12122 [ec] & e 23 - Distributed OLTP Databases (CMU Databases Systems / Fall 2019)
